item.title: Access Okta APIs with users credentials
item.description: Access Okta APIs with user’s credentials Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Implement OAuth for Okta: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/implement-oauth-for-okta/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. How-tos tend to walk the reader step by step through administrative tasks but not exclusively.

item.title: Access Okta APIs with machine credentials

Merge content from both to create this doc. Links to original docs: - Implement OAuth for Okta with a service app: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/implement-oauth-for-okta-serviceapp/main/ Build an API service integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-api-integration/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
